title: Hestan 54in Deluxe Natural Gas Grill With Double Side Burner
description:
In this video we take a look at the Hestan Deluxe natural gas grill with a double side burner.  To see all Hestan has to offer make sure to visit us at Abt.com: http://www.abt.com/brand/Hestan?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=video&utm_campaign=HESTAN_20170426 

Features:
- Horizon™ hood opens easily with spring-assisted hinges and holds at desired height
- Motion-activated Stadium™ halogen under-hood lighting illuminates cooking area, while front control panel LED lighting keeps controls visible
- Ceramic infrared top burner delivers 12,500 to 18,000 BTUs for perfect rotisserie/searing/finishing with simple touch on function
- Heavy-duty 321 stainless steel Trellis™ tubular burners provide 25,000 BTUs of high-performance power
- Lasered in-house DiamondCut™ 5/16″ stainless steel grates provide even heat distribution
- High-performance variable ceramic infrared sear burners offer 25,000 BTUs each
- Room to cook with large grilling surfaces
- Symmetrical flip-to-clean radiant tray with monogrammed ceramic briquette
- Concealed whisper-quiet rotisserie motor system features a chain-driven, single-speed, 6 rpm, 50 in-lbs motor
- Marquise™ accented control panel and hood handle with commercial-grade end caps
- Lasered in-house DiamondCut™ 5/16″ stainless steel warming rack with three vertical positions and concealed storage when not in use
- One-push automatic ignition system
- LED front control panel lighting with simple touch on function
- Heavy-gauge, welded body construction
- Stainless steel removable drip tray for easy maintenance and cleanup
- Monogrammed temperature gauge with cooking zone marks
- Infinite position monogrammed removable smoker and handle for wood chips or smoker pellets
- Zamak die-cast knobs, burner indicators and bezels
- Porcelain broiling pan with rotisserie spit and forks
- 12″ built-in double side burners
- Marquise™ accented side cart handle and commercial end caps
- Interior pullout drawer accommodates grilling tools
- Flip-down front panel with commercial grade handle for access to gas tank and pullout drawer
- Recessed Marquise™ accented panel
- Left side Marquise™ paneled fold-down side shelf for extra work space
- Extra-large gray front wheels and commercial-grade gray casters for smooth cart movement and 360° maneuverability
